name: Gerard Dacudao
text: So in other words you'll let the suspected criminals shoot you first?  Good luck on your model of law enforcement.    As to Samal incident, if the kidnap victims were your family, let me ask you, will you also offer the same "due process" when there is video of them pointing their machetes and guns at the victims while demanding 1B PhP of ransom?  I mean, wag na tayo mag bolahan.  I had an aunt you got kidnapped and was shot dead.  Dont tell me the kidnappers deserved our niceties.  Good luck uli!
